-- | mtl instances for the AbortT monad transformer
--   
--   This module provides instances for the mtl classes for AbortT.
@package AbortT-mtl
@version 1.0

module Control.Monad.Trans.Abort.Instances.MTL
instance MonadRWS r w s m => MonadRWS r w s (AbortT a m)
instance MonadState s m => MonadState s (AbortT a m)
instance MonadWriter w m => MonadWriter w (AbortT a m)
instance MonadReader r m => MonadReader r (AbortT a m)
instance MonadError e m => MonadError e (AbortT a m)
instance MonadCont m => MonadCont (AbortT a m)
